text: Marc Alfos (May 20, 1956 â€“ August 3, 2012) was a French voice actor. ==Filmography== ===Animated roles=== * Godzilla: The Series - Major Anthony Hicks * Superman: The Animated Series - Kalibak ===Live-action roles=== * 24 - Jonathan Wallace ===Film roles=== * A Bug's Life - Dim * Asterix and the Vikings - Timandahaf * Hercules - Nessus * Muppet Treasure Island - Billy Bones * Over the Hedge - Dwayne LaFontant * Renaissance - Nusrat Farfella * Robots - Jack Hammer * Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas - Kale * The Incredibles - Mr. Incredible/Bob Parr * Toy Story - Sarge * Toy Story 2 - Sarge * Toy Story 3 - Sarge ===Video game roles=== * Dark Messiah of Might and Magic - Human Leader == References == == Other websites == * IMDb Profile Category:French voice actors Category:1956 births Category:2012 deaths
